item.title: 法国通胀因能源问题降至 2020 年以来最低水平
item.description: 法国的通货膨胀率进一步低于欧洲中央银行设定的 2% 的目标，创下四年多来的新低，这也为进一步削减借贷成本提供了依据。【原文：France’s inflation rate dropped further below the European Central Bank’s 2% target, reaching a more than four-year low and adding to arguments that borrowing costs can be cut further.】

item.title: 随着加密货币规则的出现，Blockchain.com 寻求非洲扩张
item.description: Blockchain.com 是一家总部位于英国的加密货币交易所，它正寻求在非洲国家拓展业务，这些国家已开始制定监管该行业的规则。【原文：Blockchain.com, a UK-based crypto exchange, is seeking to expand in African nations that have started to institute rules to regulate the industry.】

item.title: 马来西亚为中国提供棕榈油，挑起 "火锅外交
item.description: 麻辣火锅是一种流行的麻辣菜肴，在煨锅中加入生肉和蔬菜烹制而成。【原文：Malaysia is seeking to expand its palm oil market in China by offering a plant-based alternative for use in mala hotpot, a popular spicy dish that’s cooked with raw meats and vegetables in a simmering pot.】

item.title: 日本政府小组就收益率上升对财政的影响发出警告
item.description: 日本政府的一个顾问小组敦促政府当局加大财政整顿力度，因为日本央行持续的货币紧缩政策增加了世界上负债最多的发达国家偿债成本上升的风险。【原文：A Japanese government advisory panel urged authorities to step up fiscal consolidation efforts, as the Bank of Japan’s ongoing monetary tightening efforts raise the risk of higher debt-servicing costs for the world’s most indebted developed nation.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税首月瑞士对美出口骤降
item.description: 4 月份，瑞士对美国的出口大幅下降，显示出唐纳德-特朗普总统关税政策的影响。【原文：Swiss exports to the US plummeted in April, showing the fallout from President Donald Trump’s tariff policy.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数因贸易乐观情绪而反弹
汇丰银行在投资银行业务改革中裁减数十个分析师职位
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着欧洲最大的银行深化投资银行业务重组，汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）最近几天已裁减了二十多名分析师。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has culled more than two dozen analysts in recent days as Europe’s largest lender deepens a restructuring of its investment banking businesses, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 小麦带旱情缓解，中国南方迎来暴雨
item.description: 继上周的暴雨为中国北部的小麦种植农户解了燃眉之急之后，中国南部正准备迎接一场大雨，这场大雨将为一些干旱的农业地区补充土壤水分。【原文：Southern China is bracing for heavy rain that’s set to replenish soil moisture in some parched agricultural regions, following storms last week that provided relief for wheat farmers in the north of the country.】

item.title: 世界银行称肯尼亚经济增长将因债务和财政压力而放缓
item.description: 世界银行表示，在公共财政紧张和债务高企的不利因素影响下，肯尼亚的经济增速预计将连续第二年放缓。【原文：Kenya’s economic growth rate is expected to slow for the second straight year amid headwinds from tight public finances and high debt levels, the World Bank said.】

item.title: 据说日本财务省将就债券销售问题向市场发声
item.description: 几位熟悉内情的人士称，日本财务省已就政府债券的适当发行量向市场参与者发出了一份调查问卷。【原文：Japan’s finance ministry has sent a questionnaire to market participants regarding appropriate issuance amounts for government bonds, several people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 匈牙利将维持利率不变，关注价格风险：决策指南
item.description: 匈牙利央行可能将维持利率不变，因为即使政府发出经济增长前景恶化的信号，决策者仍将重点关注抑制通胀风险。【原文：Hungary’s central bank will probably keep interest rates unchanged as policymakers focus on curbing inflation risks even as the government signals a worsening outlook for growth.】

item.title: 交易商对需求前景保持谨慎，铁矿石回调
item.description: 铁矿石连跌第四天，原因是交易商对需求保持谨慎，并评估了限制中国钢铁行业产能过剩的举措。【原文：Iron ore extended its losing streak for a fourth day as traders remained cautious about demand and assessed moves to limit overcapacity in China’s steel sector.】

item.title: 美团、京东的送餐大战加剧千亿美元大战
item.description: 自去年年底以来，美团和 JD.com 的股票市值合计损失了 1,000 亿美元，凸显了为在中国食品外卖业务中赢得更大份额而进行的一场代价高昂的战斗所带来的影响。【原文：Shares of Meituan and JD.com have lost a combined $100 billion in market value since late last year, highlighting the fallout of a costly battle to win a bigger slice of the Chinese food delivery business.】

item.title: 据说三星正在洽谈投资美国医疗器械公司 Exo
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，三星电子公司的投资部门是寻求投资美国医疗保健软件和设备公司Exo Imaging Inc.的公司之一。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s investment arm is among a group of firms seeking to invest in US health-care software and device company Exo Imaging Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美元回落，台币逼近五月峰值
item.description: 台币正逐步接近本月初创下的最高点，当时台币创下了自 20 世纪 80 年代以来的最大单日涨幅。【原文：The Taiwanese dollar is edging close to a peak set earlier this month, when it notched the biggest single day gain since the 1980s.】

item.title: 马来西亚认为美国将关税降至 10%是一个好结果
item.description: 投资、贸易和工业部长扎弗鲁尔-阿齐兹（Zafrul Aziz）表示，美国将对马来西亚的关税降至 10%的基准线将被视为一个积极的举措，但他也承认，之前希望的零关税可能无法实现。【原文：The US reducing its proposed tariffs on Malaysia to a 10% baseline would be seen as a positive move, Investment, Trade and Industry Minister Zafrul Aziz said, conceding that a previously hoped for levy of zero may not be possible.】

item.title: 尽管估值昂贵，Nifty 印度国防指数仍创下历史新高
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 泰国亿万富翁将主要公司的股份转给子女
item.description: 泰国第二大富豪查龙-西里瓦达那巴哈克迪（Charoen Sirivadhanabhakdi）将两家主要上市公司的所有权转让给了他的五个子女，这位八旬高龄的商人从啤酒到房地产集团的日常管理中抽身而出。【原文：Thailand’s second-richest person Charoen Sirivadhanabhakdi transferred ownership of two major listed companies to his five children as the octogenarian businessman pulls back from day-to-day management of his beer to property conglomerate.】

item.title: 尽管贸易战暂停，中国塑料买家仍拒绝转回美国丙烷
item.description: 今年早些时候，美国与中国的贸易关系破裂，中国塑料工厂失去了美国的原材料，尽管敌对状态有所缓和，但中国塑料工厂仍暂缓返回许多供应商处，这凸显了恢复世界两大经济体之间商业联系的难度。【原文：Chinese plastics factories left without US raw material when trade relations collapsed earlier this year are holding back from returning to many of those suppliers despite a pause in hostilities, underscoring the difficulty in restoring commercial ties between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 对冲基金押注韩元将反映台币升势
item.description: 对冲基金正在期权市场上加大押注，认为韩元将反映台币近期对美元的涨势。【原文：Hedge funds are ramping up bets in the options market that the South Korean won will mirror the Taiwan dollar’s recent rally against the greenback.】

item.title: 上田表示日本央行仍在寻求更多加息措施，这将提振日元走势
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫明确表示，如果经济如预期般改善，他将继续提高基准利率，从而提振了日元。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda gave the yen a boost by clearly indicating his intention to continue raising the benchmark interest rate if the economy improves as expected.】

item.title: 澳大利亚人报》称 Cerberus 看中了中国公司的达尔文港
item.description: 据《澳大利亚人报》报道，美国私募股权公司 Cerberus Capital Management LP 正准备竞购具有重要战略意义的达尔文港，该港口目前由中国公司陆桥集团（Landbridge Group）拥有。【原文：US private equity firm Cerberus Capital Management LP is preparing a bid for the strategically-important Port of Darwin, currently owned by Chinese firm Landbridge Group, The Australian newspaper reported.】

item.title: ALS 将筹集高达 3.9 亿澳元的资金，用于发展实验室网络
item.description: 澳大利亚的 ALS 有限公司正在寻求筹集高达 3.9 亿澳元（2.53 亿美元）的资金，以扩大其实验室网络。【原文：Australia’s ALS Ltd. is seeking to raise up to A$390 million ($253 million) as the testing services company looks to expand its laboratory network.】

item.title: 日本 34 年来首次失去最大债权国地位
item.description: 尽管日本的海外资产创下了历史新高，但它 34 年来首次失去了世界最大债权国的地位。【原文：Japan lost its position as the world’s largest creditor nation for the first time in 34 years, despite posting a record amount of overseas assets.】

item.title: 欧盟与美国贸易谈判影响避险需求，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 由于避险资产需求降温，投资者权衡美国与欧盟贸易关系改善的前景，黄金小幅下跌。【原文：Gold held a small decline as demand for haven assets cooled, with investors weighing prospects for improving trade relations between the US and the EU.】

item.title: 香港交易所计划于 2026 年开始零日期权交易
item.description: 香港的证券交易所正在寻求最早于 2026 年上半年推出一天内到期的期权，从而将近年来推动美国衍生品繁荣的一种工具带到亚洲中心。【原文：Hong Kong’s stock exchange is seeking to launch options that expire within a day as early as the first half of 2026, bringing to the Asian hub an instrument that has driven a boom in US derivatives in recent years.】

item.title: 小米在财报发布前击败同行，树立了新标杆
item.description: 小米公司将于周二晚些时候公布财报，要想超越投资者已经很高的预期，难度可想而知。【原文：It’ll be tough for Xiaomi Corp. to beat investors’ already high expectations when it reports earnings later Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本国债收益率在 40 年期国债拍卖测试前下跌
item.description: 日本超长期债券的收益率在周三的拍卖前下跌，预计这次拍卖将考验需求，因为最近的一次拍卖引发了全球市场的恐慌。【原文：Yields on Japanese super-long bonds fell ahead of an auction Wednesday that is expected to test demand following a recent sale that sent jitters through global markets.】

item.title: 交易商关注欧盟贸易谈判和欧佩克+会议，油价保持稳定
item.description: 在欧佩克+会议就供应政策做出决定之前，市场权衡了欧盟与美国之间贸易紧张局势缓和的前景，石油市场持稳。【原文：Oil was steady as the market weighed the prospect for easing trade tensions between the European Union and the US ahead of an OPEC+ meeting that will make a decision on supply policy.】

item.title: 英国食品通胀一年来最高，杂货商面临更多成本问题
item.description: 英国食品通胀率在 5 月份略有上升，达到一年来的最高水平，原因是英国超市要应对英国政府增收预算带来的运营成本上升。【原文：UK food inflation nudged up in May to the highest level in a year, as British supermarkets battle higher operating costs stemming from the UK government’s revenue-raising budget.】
